articles.title: Russian Figures Arrive
articles.content:
Russian Figures Arrive
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Oleg Shishov, director general of the "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia, and his party arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Russians Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russians Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Oleg Shishov, director general of the "Mostovik" Scientific-Industrial Company of Russia, and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues in humble reverence for the peerlessly great men who made immortal contributions to the development of the DPRK-Russia friendly relations and the accomplishment of the global cause of independence before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is the doyen of the corps, conveyed the floral basket and congratulatory letter to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Prove Successful at Short Track Speed Skating Competition
articles.content:
DPRK Prove Successful at Short Track Speed Skating Competition
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 2013 Short-Track Speed Skating Competition for Danubia Cup and Slovak Open.
					 The contest held in Slovakia from December 20 to 22 brought together more than 100 men and women skaters of 13 countries including the DPRK, Russia, Romania, Hungary and Poland.
					
					 Participants in the contests divided into adult and youth groups competed in various events for final standings. 
					
					 Choe Un Song took the first place in total points in 500-metre, 1,000-metre and 1,500-metre events of adult group, bagging a gold.
					
					 Ju Yun Mi and Choe Sung finished second in total points each in women's adult and youth groups, garnering silvers while Kim Chol Gwang came third in total points in men's adult group, winning a bronze.

articles.title: DPRK Sees Progress in Health Service This Year
articles.content:
DPRK Sees Progress in Health Service This Year
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made a lot of achievements in public health service this year.
					 In Munsu area of Pyongyang, there appeared the Ryugyong Dental Hospital and the Okryu Children's Hospital, which are equipped with up-to-date facilities for medical treatment and researches. And a vitamin-C plant was built on the bank of the Taedong River.
					
					 Typical of the achievements is the expansion of distance surgery aid network throughout the country, a progress in telemedicine service. The service was highly admired by the participants in the WHO South-East Asia Regional Technical Consultation on Telemedicine held in Pyongyang on July 30-August 1.
					
					 Stem cell implantation was successfully applied to the treatment of intractable diseases like caput femoris aseptic necrosis and woman's diseases.
					
					 The Breast Tumour Institute under the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital has achieved successes in earlier detection and cure of breast cancer and mastopathy, while many local hospitals considerably increased the rate of painless childbirth.
					
					 Thousands of cataract cases underwent surgical operation with success.
					
					 Various kinds of preventive inoculations, including primaquine vaccination, have been conducted in favor of local people throughout the country.
					
					 A big success was made in manufacturing traditional medicines on an extractive and scientific basis at numbers of Koryo medicine-processing factories, all of them overfulfilled their yearly assignments.
					
					 Abdominal diagnostic ultrasound instrumentation and other medical instruments were produced to prove effective at healthcare institutions.
					
					 This year saw the holding of the 15th symposium on medical science with attendance of medical scientists from home and abroad and the 15th national exhibition of scientific and technological achievements in health service, which were largely conducive to developing the nation's medical science.

articles.title: DPRK People's Efforts Devoted to Perpetuating Memory of Leader
articles.content:
DPRK People's Efforts Devoted to Perpetuating Memory of Leader
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- It has been two years after leader Kim Jong Il passed away on December 17, 2011.
					 In the period the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK have devotedly worked to perpetuate the memory of their leader, with the unshakable faith, pure conscience and strong sense of moral obligation.
					
					 With the 1st anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise as an occasion, the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, where the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, was further spruced up as the sacred temple of Juche thanks to the meticulous guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and citizens' loyal devotion. The palace is very wonderful and perfect in content, form and scale.
					
					 The law on the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was adopted on April 1, 2013, to permanently preserve the palace as a monumental edifice for perpetuating the memory of the Generalissimos. Meanwhile, the plaza of the palace turned into a park of flower garden with sincerity and loyalty of all the people.
					
					 Last year the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on horsebacks appeared in the compound of the Mansudae Art Studio on the Day of the Shining Star, the birthday of Kim Jong Il. And their figure statues were erected on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. The erection in a little more than 100 days showed the DPRK people's strong will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 Similar statues took their shapes at Kim Il Sung Military University, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and in cities of Kanggye and Hamhung, while Kim Jong Il's sole statue was built in the compound of the Ministry of State Security for the first time in the country. 
					
					 The highest order and prizes bearing smiling images of Kim Jong Il were instituted, and smiling portraits of the Generalissimos, mosaic murals depicting them set up across the country.
					
					 The tower with the letters reading "The great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be with us" appeared in all provinces, cities, counties, industrial establishments, farms and universities.
					
					 With the diamond jubilee of the Korean people's victory in the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War as an occasion, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum in Pyongyang was newly built into a center for education in the undying feats of the Generalissimos for war victory and the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 Besides, the Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University, Jonsung Revolutionary Museum and other revolutionary sites and museums in the country have been spruced up thanks to the devoted efforts of the army and people.

articles.title: Coach, Witness to Kim Jong Il's Field Guidance
articles.content:
Coach, Witness to Kim Jong Il's Field Guidance
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- On display at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, is a coach leader Kim Jong Il had used in his lifetime, when giving field guidance to various units across the country.
					 He made 1 647 trips of field guidance by train, covering more than 398,000 kilometers, in disregard of weather conditions. Therefore, the people of the DPRK called his coach "office carriage" or the "supreme command moving on railroads". 
					
					 Encouraged by his field guidance, the local people achieved noteworthy successes in their efforts to turn the country into a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 In his lifetime, Kim Jong Il always regarded people's happiness as his own and made ceaseless trips to different parts of the country.
					
					 It was also in the "office carriage" that he passed away in December 2011.  
					
					 2 years have passed since his demise, but the coach reminds everyone of his whole life of devotion to the happiness and wellbeing of the people. -0-

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Can Never Escape Stern Judgment by History: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Can Never Escape Stern Judgment by History: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative regime will have to pay dearly for the hideous acts of treachery it has committed quite contrary to the will and wishes of the people, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article:
					 The anti-"government" popular actions now sweeping across south Korea are an eruption of resentment of people of various circles at the present ruling forces that have trampled down their vital rights by enforcing their fascist dictatorial rule for the past one year since they illegally seized power through unheard-of fraudulent election.
					
					 The conservative group has revived the ruling system and machinery dating back to the period of the "yusin" dictatorship and mercilessly violated the democratic freedom and rights of the toiling masses who account for an overwhelming majority of the population.
					
					 It has followed the policy of confrontation with compatriots what it called "confidence-building process," stoking distrust and confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 It is getting more reckless in its anti- DPRK nuclear and "human rights" campaigns in cooperation with outside forces, refusing to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The group's moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship and escalate the confrontation with compatriots will only trigger off bitterer wrath among the people.
					
					 The group of traitors, driven into in an extremely serious crisis after being cursed and forsaken by the people, is seeking a way out in intensifying its fascist suppression of them.
					
					 As history shows, all the puppet ruling forces, without exception, met a miserable end for resorting to fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 The fascist suppression is by no means a recipe for everything. No brutal crackdown on the part of the conservative group can arrest the popular actions.

articles.title: KCNA on Japan's Persistent Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
KCNA on Japan's Persistent Anti-DPRK Campaign
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Japan is persistently pulling up the DPRK over its non-existent "nuclear and missile threat" and "abduction issue" on the international arena.
					 The chief executive of Japan told at the special Japan-ASEAN summit on December 14 that DPRK's "nuclear and missile development" poses a threat to the international community and the "abduction issue" is universal to the international community.
					
					 It is undesirable to speak ill of other countries at the international meeting that seeks multi-faceted regional cooperation and development.
					
					 His remarks were no more than petty tricks to find an excuse for justifying Japan's undisguised moves for militarization and overseas reinvasion and improve its image defiled by such extra-large inhumane crimes as sexual slavery committed by the Imperial Japanese Army in the past.
					
					 They came in coincidence with the adoption of the new "Defense Program Guidelines", "Mid-term Defense Capability Buildup Outline" and the National Security Strategy, the first of its kind, in Japan, which are called the "three arrows of security". This reveals Japan's ambition to realize its wild dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" by departing from the postwar regime as soon as possible.
					
					 In actuality, Japan has been rushing headlong towards the right deviation and militarization, speeding up arms buildup and the revision of its constitution. Now, it tries to lay a legal framework for overseas aggression by reforming the "Self-Defense Forces" into the national defense army and arming them with up-to-date military hardware.
					
					 Such moves for militarization on the part of the present government of Japan are provoking strong antipathy among the international community.
					
					 It is likely that Japan does not know it can neither win trust of other Asian nations nor is in a position to talk about "universal issue" unless it has fully settled its crime-woven past.
					
					 Japan's peddling of the "abduction issue" only showed its cunning and despicable nature.
					
					 Even, press media of Japan contended that the rumor about "threat" spread by the government was aimed to fan up uneasiness among its citizens and then beef up defense capabilities so as to provide the conditions for the SDF to acquire the capability of attacking enemy bases.
					
					 It is impudent for Japan, a war criminal state still refusing to liquidate its blood-stained past and a target of world public criticism for its ongoing militarization moves, to heap an abuse on others in an attempt to improve its image.
					
					 Japan is not entitled to talk about someone's "threat", and it should make fully and honestly settle its past before anything else if it wants to be called a normal state.

articles.title: Solidarity Action for Checking Privatization of Railway Service Called for
articles.content:
Solidarity Action for Checking Privatization of Railway Service Called for
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Dec. 20 posted an editorial calling for intensifying solidarity action with the Railway Trade Union in the general strike for checking the authorities' privatization of railway service. 
					 The editorial said that the trade union is strongly protesting against the Park Geun Hye regime for moving to privatize railway service. 
					
					 A lot of people from all walks of life are now waging solidarity action, fully supporting the general strike of the trade union, it said, and went on:
					
					 As the struggle for checking the privatization of railway service is being waged against the "government", not against any private capital, the solidarity action is the only way to win it. 
					
					 Democratic labor movement organizations should more actively turn out in the solidarity action.

articles.title: Discrimination against Part-timers Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Discrimination against Part-timers Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The school part-time job headquarters of the Public Transport Trade Union under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions launched an action in Seoul on Dec. 19 calling for abolishing the discrimination against part-timers. 
					 The organization held meetings in front of the building of the "Saenuri Party" and its vicinity to secure stable employment, turn part-time jobs into regular ones and demand the chief executive carry out her commitments. 
					
					 Then it held a press conference outside the puppet "National Assembly." 
					
					 Speakers at the press conference deplored that though Park Geun Hye dines with those of the "Saenuri Party" on the lapse of one year since her election as "president", the part-time workers have to still demand for vital rights in cold weather. 
					
					 How can the people feel at ease now when dismissal is informed in an unbroken chain, they said. 
					
					 Hundreds of thousands of school part-time workers are leading a miserable life, they said, urging Park Geun Hye and the political camp to reply to the demand of the people. 
					
					 They urged the authorities to abolish the discrimination against part-timers.

articles.title: Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Demanded
articles.content:
Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Demanded
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Seminary Students for Democracy grouping organizations of students of various theological colleges in south Korea held a mass on the situation in Seoul on Dec. 19 demanding the resignation of the puppet chief executive. 
					 Speakers recalled that the truth behind the fraudulent election held a year ago was probed, accusing Park Geun Hye of showing no reaction to it.
					
					 It is natural for the "president" elected through frauds to step down, they held.
					
					 They urged Park to step down as she pulled the wool over the eyes of the people, declaring their will to escalate the campaign for issuing declarations on the situation in demand of her resignation.
					
					 Then, the organization published a declaration on the situation before staging a demonstration.

articles.title: Nullification of Fraudulent Election Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification of Fraudulent Election Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Protest actions were staged in different parts of south Korea on the lapse of one year since the chief executive was elected  in the "presidential election" by scandals and swindles.
					 People of different social standings including civic, public and religious circles and opposition parties in South Jolla Province held a meeting outside the building of the provincial "assembly" on Dec. 19 to demand the nullification the fraudulent election with government power involved and resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 A declaration on the situation was published at the meeting.
					
					 The declaration said that the people are demanding the chief executive's apology and punishment of those responsible as regards the power organs' interference in the election.
					
					 But the "government" has turned its back on this demand with lies and made no scruple of putting an unreasonable pressure in a bid to lay hurdles in the way of the investigation into the case, it noted.
					
					 It denounced the regime for cracking down on the people and believers who have ideas different from it, criticize it and tell truth after defining them as the "forces following the north." 
					
					 Last year's "presidential" election is null and void and Park should step down as she took office through the fraudulent election with government power involved, it held.
					
					 Civic and public organizations in Kwangju held a press conference on the same day, declaring the results of last year's election null and void and urging the chief executive to step down.
					
					 At the press conference speakers demanded the authorities probe the truth behind the election rigging, stop privatization and enforce politics for people's life. 
					
					 Civic and public organizations in North Jolla Province held a meeting on the emergency situation in Jonju on Dec. 18 at which they published a declaration on the situation calling for the resignation of Park, probe into the truth about the election rigging and halt to the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north".

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Bouquets to DPRK Missions in Various Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Bouquets to DPRK Missions in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, ministries of governments, organizations, institutions and personages sent floral baskets and bouquets to DPRK missions in their countries on Dec. 17 and 18 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Cuban Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Trade and Foreign Investment, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Foreign Ministry of Ethiopia, the general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, a secretary of the first vice-president of Iran, the director of an Iranian trade company, the chairman of the Malaysian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il, the general director of the Malaysian M.K.P Company and the general manager of a coal and minerals company of Malaysia, etc.
					
					 Those floral baskets and bouquets were placed before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings depicting Kim Il Sung standing together with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, foreign diplomatic missions in Cuba sent floral baskets and bouquets to the DPRK embassy in Havana.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from Dec. 13 to 16 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. They included round-table talks and photo exhibition in Iran, a lecture and photo exhibition in Uganda and photo exhibition and film show in Nigeria.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were photos introducing the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Arms of Korea."
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader who performed undying exploits for independence, sovereignty and prosperity of the DPRK and the sacred cause for global independence till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK emerged a power with tremendous military capabilities and took high position in the world political arena, the chairman noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as unique guidelines for resolutely smashing the moves of the imperialists and reactionaries and achieving the unity of the African continent.
					
					 The Juche idea, the Songun idea serves as an ideological weapon for saving Africa from the threat of imperialism and neo-colonialism.
					
					 The DPRK has developed economy, culture and military affairs on the principle of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence. This experience is a living example for Africa.
					
					 We will study harder the Juche idea, the Songun idea and make positive efforts to apply it to the actual conditions of Africa.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups from Dec. 13 to 17 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Syrian paper Al Thawrah carried an article illustrated with a photo documenting revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said:
					
					 December 17 marks the second anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The international community is highly praising Kim Jong Il as a distinguished thinker and theoretician and the greatest man.
					
					 He passed away but he is alive in the hearts of all people for his immortal exploits.
					
					 The paper Al Baath in an article lauded the sacred revolutionary career of the peerless great man who made tangible contributions to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Hungarian paper Liberation carried an article saying that Kim Jong Un is leading the party, army and people of the DPRK to victory, true to the intentions of the preceding leaders. The paper edited a photo of him inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Guinean national and international broadcasting services aired a program under the title "The feats performed by great HE Kim Jong Il for human cause of independence will shine forever."
					
					 It reported that Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man and defender of socialist cause, peace and justice who made a great contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 His idea and cause are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, it stressed.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted special write-ups on its website on Dec. 9 to mark the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The website in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, undying exploits of Songun" noted:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il bolstered up the country's military power at the highest level through his Songun leadership.
					
					 He, to begin with, directed his efforts to getting the KPA fully prepared politically and ideologically. He also paid deep attention to bolstering up its military and technological capabilities. 
					
					 He led all service personnel of the KPA train harder and harder to have robust physical strength and excellent marksmanship.
					
					 His Songun leadership is being successfully carried forward by the respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The website in an article titled "Dedicating her whole life to emancipation of women" lauded the great revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Jong Suk for the movement of Korean women's emancipation and its development will always shine along with ever-victorious socialist Korea, it added.

articles.title: Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en ciudad de Wonsan
articles.content:
Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en ciudad de Wonsan
Wonsan, 22 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 22o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fueron construidas en la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente.
					Las estatuas describen al Presidente sonriente con una mano puesta en la cintura y al Dirigente quien vestido en modesto abrigo de campana, bendice con su sonrisa tan amplia como el sol el futuro maravilloso de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					La ceremonia de develado tuvo lugar la vispera.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios correspondientes, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios y empleados de las unidades, brigadistas de construccion, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares en la provincia quienes contribuyeron a la construccion de estatuas.
					
					Develaron las estatuas los cuadros del partido, el Estado, el ejercito y de la provincia.
					
					Fue colocado al pie de ellas un cesto de flores enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Quedo depositado el otro en nombre comun del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					Se depositaron los cestos de flores en nombre de la provincia de Kangwon, las instituciones del partido y el Poder, organos, empresas, fabricas y granjas a todos niveles de la provincia, y las unidades del EPC y del ESIPC.
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron tributo ante las estatuas expresando el testimonio de gran respeto a los Generalisimos que dedicaron sus valiosas vidas al cumplimiento de la causa del Juche y la del Songun y realizaron imperecederas hazanas ante la patria y la nacion, la epoca y la historia.
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, senalo que estan registradas en la provincia las sagradas huellas de orientacion del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Prosiguio que el levantamiento de las estatuas en la provincia es un fruto de la fidelidad sincera y obligacion moral del Mariscal y una expresion de la firme determinacion de los habitantes provincianos de glorificar para siempre sus hazanas revolucionarias.
					
					Exhorto a todos los funcionarios y trabajadores a luchar energicamente por la victoria final de la construccion de Estado prospero socialista y la causa revolucionaria del Juche levantando en alto las banderas con efigies de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu y uniendose monoliticamente en torno al CC del PTC encabezado por el Mariscal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta intento de EE.UU. de imputar responsabilidad a RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta intento de EE.UU. de imputar responsabilidad a RPDC
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el vocero del Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos dijo que es muy importante para su pais mantener la estabilidad de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y anadio tanto que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no debe cometer actos provocadores que vulneren la estabilidad regional.
					Con anterioridad, un asistente adjunto del secretario del mismo departamento chismeo en el llamado "seminario conmemorativo" que el desarrollo de arma nuclear y misil de la RPDC constituye el "desafio mas serio" para EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Esos dichos comprueban que el pais norteamericano, que vino empeorando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a lo largo del ano, trata ahora de imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Asi opina el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 22 y continua:
					
					EE.UU. no puede ocultar su siniestra intencion ni sus crimenes aunque hable con mucha elocuencia.
					
					Solo en los ultimos meses, desarrollo sin parar en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno los ejercicios militares conjuntos y aumento sus fuerzas armadas.
					
					Desde finales de septiembre pasado, libro en secreto en el Mar Este de Corea los ejercicios navales conjuntos contra la RPDC.  
					
					Seguidamente, realizo otra maniobra en el Mar Sur mandando al Puerto de Pusan la flotilla de portaaviones nuclear que habia participado en susodichos ejercicios. 
					
					En aquel entonces, para disimular su malsano objetivo, mintieron que esas maniobras tuvieron la meta de disuadir la posible "provocacion" de la RPDC, inclusive la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misil.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, EE.UU. publico la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" que significa el aumento de la amenaza de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC y el acabado del plan de ataque preventivo nuclear. Del 25 de octubre a la primera quincena de noviembre, desarrollo junto con los titeres surcoreanos el entrenamiento aereo "Max Sender" de mayor dimension en la historia. Tambien, trata de vender al Sur de Corea 40 cazabombarderos tipo Stealth "F-35" y 14 helicopteros militares "CH-47D" y fundo con los titeres surcoreanos el comite de capacidad antimisil cuya mision es el ataque preventivo a la RPDC.
					
					Esas maniobras de guerra realizadas en menos de 3 meses crearon una situacion a punto de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Sin embargo, el imperio esta acusando cinicamente a la RPDC de empeorar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. no debe enganar con embustes a la sociedad internacional.
					
					El imperio es el culpable que destruye la paz y la estabilidad de la region con incesantes ejercicios de guerra y aumento armamentista.

articles.title: "Poder" traidor de Sur de Corea no podra evitar castigo de historia, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Poder" traidor de Sur de Corea no podra evitar castigo de historia,  destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que los conservadores titeres surcoreanos, que recurren con frenesi a las maquinaciones traidoras negando la voluntad y la demanda de los habitantes, pagaran el precio muy caro, y continua:
					La lucha masiva antigubernamental de los habitantes, que se extiende en todo el territorio surcoreano, es la expresion de la colera de los habitantes de distintos sectores a las fuerzas del poder actual que durante un ano de la toma ilegal del poder violaron cruelmente el derecho a la existencia de los habitantes practicando la dominacion dictatorial fascista.
					
					La banda de conservadores resucito el sistema de dominio y aparatos de represion de la epoca de dictadura de "Yusin" y violo y extermino sin piedad la libertad y el derecho democraticos de las masas trabajadoras.
					
					Al presentar la politica de confrontacion fratricida con el llamado "proceso de confianza" exacerbo la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Negando el respeto y la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre recurre a la campana nuclear e intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					A medida que la banda conservadora surcoreana se enfrasca al renacimiento de la dictadura de "Yusin" y las campanas de confrontacion fratricida se aumenta mas la indignacion de los habitantes.
					
					La banda traidora puesta en la extrema crisis siendo objeto del odio de los habitantes busca su salida en el fortalecimiento de la represion fascista.
					
					Como muestra la historia, fue siempre muy tragico el destino de los gobernadores titeres que recurrieron a la dictadura fascista.
					
					La represion fascista no es el todopoderoso.
					
					Los conservadores titeres del Sur de Corea no podran detener la lucha masiva de los habitantes.

articles.title: ACNC comenta comportamiento de Japon en Cumbre Especial de Asean
articles.content:
ACNC comenta comportamiento de Japon en Cumbre Especial de Asean
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la escena internacional Japon acusa obstinadamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de "amenaza nuclear y de misil" y de "problema de secuestro".
					En la Cumbre Especial de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (Asean), sostenida el dia 14, el mandatario japones dijo que "el desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea constituye una amenaza a toda la sociedad internacional" y que "el problema de secuestro es el universal para la sociedad internacional".
					
					?Por que Japon se comporta asi acusando a otro en la reunion que persigue la cooperacion y el desarrollo multilaterales en la region?
					
					Es para preparar el pretexto a fin de racionalizar el militarismo y los preparativos de reagresion en la etapa crucial y para lavar su imagen manchada por el crimen antietico de gran dimension inclusive el de las esclavas sexuales de las viejas tropas japonesas.
					
					Japon aprobo de una vez el nuevo "gran programa de defensa", el "plan de arreglo de fuerzas defensivas de tiempo intermedio" y la primera estrategia de seguridad nacional, considerados como "tres flechas de seguridad", mientras habla tanto en la escena internacional de la "amenaza" de alguien, lo que demuestra que el pais isleno intenta realizar el viejo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" liberandose, lo mas pronto posible, del sistema posbelico.
					
					Realmente, ese pais corre por el camino de  derechizacion y militarizacion dando acicate al aumento armamentista y la enmienda de la constitucion. Esta preparando la base institucional y juridica para la agresion a ultramar tales como la reforma de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en el "ejercito de defensa nacional" y armamento con los equipos militares ultramodernos.
					
					Enloquecido en la expansion a ultramar, el gobierno japones recurre a las maniobras de militarismo, lo cual provoca gran antipatia de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Pero, parece que Japon se haya olvidado de que no puede disfrutar de la confianza de los paises asiaticos antes de liquidar totalmente sus pasados crimenes agresivos ni tiene calificacion de hablar de los llamados problemas universales.
					
					Cuanto mas Japon habla mucho del "problema de secuestro", tanto mas pondra a plena luz su naturaleza astuta y vil.
					
					Hasta los medios de prensa de Japon, transmitieron que la invencion de la "teoria de amenaza" alienta el sentimiento inestable de los habitantes y con tal motivo, fortalece las fuerzas militares y persigue preparar las condiciones favorables a hacer que "las fuerzas de autodefensa dispongan de la capacidad de ataque contra las bases enemigas".
					
					Es un comportamiento descarado el que Japon, estado criminal de guerra, que no habia liquidado todavia el pasado lleno de crimenes, y objeto de denuncia de la sociedad internacional por sus maniobras de militarismo, trata de mejorar su imagen manchada cuestionando a otro.
					
					Japon no tiene calificacion de hablar de ninguna "amenaza".
					
					Si quiere tener la imagen internacional como Estado normal, debe liquidar con sinceridad el pasado criminal.
